de.uzk.hki.da.metadata

Class PremisXmlReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uzk.hki.da.metadata.PremisXmlReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlReader

    public class PremisXmlReader
extends Object
implements XmlReader
    Translates contents of a PREMIS file to the native object model used by the ContentBroker.
    Author:
    Daniel M. de Oliveira, Sebastian Cuy, Thomas Kleinke
